***

[The TALD project](https://ilcl.hse.ru/en/projects/) would not have been realised in its present form without advice and assistance of a number of people. 

The project is led by [Michael Daniel](https://www.hse.ru/en/staff/michael_daniel), [George Moroz](https://www.hse.ru/en/org/persons/103489498), and [Konstantin Filatov](https://www.hse.ru/en/org/persons/190921062).

[Chiara Naccarato](https://www.hse.ru/en/org/persons/224233250) and [Samira Verhees](https://www.hse.ru/en/staff/samiraverhees) coordinate the workshop for students.

Students currently working on features are: [Timofey Mukhin](https://www.hse.ru/en/org/persons/208514310), Samira Ochs, Rita Popova, [Anastasia Panova](https://www.hse.ru/en/staff/apanova), Sara Zadykian.

Students who have contributed in the past are: Inga Kartozia, Denis Arsentjev, Violetta Ivanova.

Timofey Mukhin is responsible for the TALD website.

Photos presented on the site are taken by Michael Daniel, [Timur Maisak](https://www.hse.ru/en/staff/maisak), Timofey Mukhin and Konstantin Filatov?.
